matchId.description: Identifier for the file being uploaded to TDR.

transferId.description: Unique identifier for the TDR transfer.

Modified.description: The date the file was last modified

SHA256ClientSideChecksum.description: Checksum generated before file uploaded to TDR, used for file integrity check.

Length.description: Size of the uploaded file in bytes.

FileRef.description: The path to the file obtained from the client side.

FileLeafRef.description: The name of the file obtained from SharePoint. Will be displayed to the public as the description if no description is provided.
